page.title: 20Wilkin Jam Factory,Tiptree
page.content: Kelly Pollard and Cathy Towler went to the Jam Factory. When we went in we saw a cabinet that was full of jams.We went into Mr.J.Wilkins office and had a chat. Afterwards he asked us if we would like to look around the factory, so we said "Yes." I didn't know how much sugar they used until Kelly asked. They said they used 60 tons of sugar a week and 200,000 a year. Then we went into the cold room. Mr.Wilkin said that there was about 15 degrees of frost. Then we went into the factory. We went past the machine where the jams had been bottled ready to store by 11.15. They would have made 17,480 pots by tonight. It would make 65,000 pots of jam a day. Soon we had been all around the factory.
